description: Group presentation on an Australian ecosystem, its key threatening process, and creative solutions. Includes individual reflection and contributions to group discussions.
Multiple choice test covering lecture content from weeks 1-4, taken at the end of week 4 to assess understanding of foundational concepts.

Individual scientific report in journal article format using field trip data. Includes three submissions: Introduction (15%), Methods/Results (10%), and Discussion/Abstract/References (20%) with iterative feedback.
Quizzes with multiple choice and short answer questions assessing understanding of lecture content from weeks 5-9, focusing on real-world case studies and ecological threat management.
